questions.question: Why is it important to use different passwords for each account?
options: To limit damage if one account is breached
questions.correctAnswer: To limit damage if one account is breached

questions.question: What’s the most secure method for storing passwords?
options: A sticky note on your desk
A text file on your desktop
Memorizing one password for all accounts

questions.question: What does two-factor authentication (2FA) involve?
options: A password plus a secondary verification method
questions.correctAnswer: A password plus a secondary verification method

questions.question: What should you do if you think your password is compromised?
options: Use it until it stops working
